> Realizing his mistake of the second shot he made a
> semicirle and tried a shot at Nightshades forehead
> from the same distance, but a different position and
> then started moving again.
>

{Nightshade}

    The fox pred jumped back as the shot came in, the second shot had indeed
given away the shooters location and she had locked onto him, even when he
moved for a better shot at her he had already given away his position.
Ducking behind an outcropping of rock and foilage Nightshade shouted, "Take
him down Inferno I'll cover you..." Though she had no ranged weapon of her
own she was more than willing to let the stupid insect bot think it would
have some cover as she attempted to skirt around and flank their concealed
enemy.
